category: Items Secured by a Physical Key
explanation: Door Lock, Car Ignition, Diary, and Padlock all typically require a physical key for their primary security or operation. A Combination Safe uses a numerical code rather than a physical key.

Augustus, Nero, Marcus Aurelius, and Hadrian were all Roman Emperors. Julius Caesar was a powerful Roman general and statesman, but he was never officially an emperor; he was appointed dictator perpetuo.
Nucleus, Electron, Proton, and Neutron are all components or subatomic particles found within an atom. An atom is the complete structure, not one of its constituent parts.
